Press 'E' on any chicken and it follows you

Game is really fun with friends, and a 3rd party matchmaking site
matchmaking in csgo is like queuing up for a lesson to learn russian or going against cheaters.
het is leuk omdat je moet oefenen en niet gelijk de beste bent en heel lang kan grinden in je shots en overalll game movement enz.
just perfect hope we get a better danger zone improvments tho

My favorite game in the world! Although if you're salty please f@ck off there's enough of you people in this game XD. 
- Graphics are gucci
- People are mostly awesome, great place to make friends
- the mechanics are up to shit but I mean most of us are here to chat anyways and hang with friends
É bem simples, o jogo é bom e eu sou ruim.
Excelente game, apesar de uns bugs
Counter Strike is my favorite game since they first launched it back in the 90's. Until now i play CS and will continue to enjoy this game forever! Cheers to the CS founder and team!
Ciekawa gra, denerwuje momentami, przyjemna, Momentami tragiczna, Wiek powinien być bardziej pilnowany zarówno jak i poziom iQ - min 90 żeby nie być szympansem ... l0l
dedt är etyt roligt spel och man fastnar dirrekt flr att försöka ranka upp
Very good game but its kinda slowly dying and sequel is greatly needed

el juego esta bastante bien pero no mola nada tener prime y que te toque cada 3 partidas minimo un hacker
Игра для меня очень интересная, и сбалансированная.Я игрую в неё уже год и за всё это время я не хотел поменять игру или удалить.
